channel.title: How do i make clean server?
channel.description: Well, i've used other people's source's, and i've had enough, i would like to 'Code' my own. Does anyon know how? and i also want to know how to add customs, Dragon Whip ECT. Thanks - If you know Post how to make, and if you want to help me with the 'Adding Custom items' Add my MSN: Ownerblitz@hotmail.com TY :D

item.title: How do i make clean server?
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“sabsabi, post:1, topic:296907”]i will tell you how to make a clean server…

Delete your server folder.[/quote]
If you aren’t going to help then don’t post troll.

A blank server is a server that doesn’t contain any useless code and uses good Java conventions. There are a few servers that have been cleaned such as Lin’s back to basic server, it is fairly clean and good for a starter if you are going to use a new server you may need to add a few features yourself and learn the conventions used in the source.

There is another way but this is pretty difficult if your not sure what your doing.
You can try cleaning you server out yourself, this means removing unnecessary commands and voids and making the server more neat and tidy.

Best of luck.

Read full topic
